subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant had 36 points and 10 rebounds as the Oklahoma City Thunder turned a matchup of two of the N.B.A.’s best teams into a blowout with a win over the Indiana Pacers.
snippet: Kevin Durant had 36 points and 10 rebounds as the Oklahoma City Thunder turned a matchup of two of the N.B.A.’s best teams into a blowout with a win over the Indiana Pacers.
